settings.title: Description
settings.content:
Embrace Simplicity and Performance

Meet Aurora, the commuter’s dream e-scooter. A high-powered 1100W motor, 40 km/h top speed, and 100km maximum range ensure you’ll go farther, faster, and smoother than ever before. Tackling hills is a breeze, thanks to its 30-degree hill climb, while the removable battery adds convenience for non-stop adventures.

Aurora is the perfect blend of speed, range, and performance—your all-in-one ride for any journey.

Disclaimer: Max speed is capped at 25 km/h when sold in Australia in compliance with local laws and regulations. The top speeds of 25 km/h (Astro), 40 km/h (Aurora), and 50 km/h (Kaiju) can only be unlocked for use on private land. Please contact us for the steps involved to unlock the speed after purchase.

settings.title: Key Features
settings.content:
Lightweight and Portable: Weighing only 23kg, the Aurora is easy to carry and transport, making it ideal for daily commutes and weekend adventures.

Easy Changeable Battery: Enjoy the convenience of a changeable battery, allowing you to charge and replace it effortlessly where there is a power point

Lithium Battery Pack: Power your ride with a robust lithium battery pack, offering up to 100km of range.

Powerful Motor: Equipped with a 550W rated power output and an 1100W maximum output, the Aurora model delivers impressive acceleration and speed.

30-Degree Climbing Angle: Conquer hills with ease. The Aurora's powerful motor supports a climbing angle of up to 30 degrees, making uphill rides smooth and effortless

Cruise Control (Unlockable): Experience effortless riding with the Aurora’s cruise control feature. Enjoy longer rides with less strain while maintaining a consistent speed.

To adjust the default settings of your scooter, such as cruise control, you can learn more here.

*Range Testing: In flat surface testing (Full Battery, 13 km/h), the Aurora and Kaiju achieved 100 km, and the Astro reached 45 km, all under standard mode with a 70 kg load.

*Cruise control can be unlocked upon request after purchase by providing proof of purchase.

On varied Australian terrain (Full Battery), using a mix of pedestrian and regular modes, the Aurora and Kaiju delivered 70–80 km, while the Astro achieved 30–35 km.

settings.title: Returns
settings.content: For information on our return policy, including eligibility and instructions, please visit our Returns & Refunds Policy.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.content:
Free Shipping on All Orders
At The Simple Commute, we believe in keeping things simple. That’s why we now offer free shipping on all orders, no matter the total.

No hidden costs or fees—just straightforward service to get you moving.

Free Click & Collect + E-Scooter Setup (Victoria Only)
Victorian customers can enjoy our free Click & Collect service, which includes complimentary e-scooter setup. Pick up your order and hit the road right away with your fully assembled e-scooter!

Fast Dispatch
We aim for speedy dispatch on all orders. Orders placed by 12 PM AEST are typically dispatched the same day, with 98% of orders leaving our Boronia, Victoria warehouse either same-day or next day. Orders placed on weekends or public holidays will ship on the next business day.

Quick Delivery
We deliver across Australia, with typical delivery times of 1 to 5 business days. However, please note that delivery times may vary based on your location.

Important Lithium Battery Shipping Info
Due to lithium battery regulations, air freight is not available, which may slightly extend delivery times. We appreciate your patience as we ensure the safe delivery of your e-scooter.

For any questions or assistance, feel free to contact our support team. We're here to help!

settings.title: What is the warranty and how does it work?
settings.content: We offer a Limited Warranty for 12 months from the date of purchase, covering defects in materials and workmanship. The warranty process involves contacting Customer Support with a description of the defect, proof of purchase, serial number, and relevant photos/videos. If the defect is covered, they will repair or replace the part at no cost to you. Shipping costs for returning defective products are covered by us. The warranty does not cover damage caused by accidents, misuse, unauthorized repairs, normal wear and tear, or cosmetic damage. Key parts like the frame and battery are covered for 1 year, while the charger, controller, and lights have shorter coverage periods.

settings.title: How can I service the scooter?
settings.content: You can service your e-scooter by bringing it to The Simple Commute's repair center (8/1001 Mountain Highway, Boronia, Melbourne), or you can ship it to us. Once the repair is complete, you have two weeks to pick up your scooter or pay the return shipping invoice. After this period, a storage fee of $25 per day applies, up to a maximum of 30 days. Proper packaging is crucial if you need to ship your scooter to the repair center. You can obtain third-party packaging or purchase a box from us (subject to availability). Repair turnaround times vary based on the availability of spare parts, ranging from 3-5 days to a minimum of 30 days. For updates, you can reach out to The Simple Commute team.

settings.title: What is the speed of the scooter?
settings.content: The speed of the Aurora E-scooter is capable of reaching up to 40 km/h. However, we have to limit it to 25 km/h to comply with local regulations. If you'd like to unlock the full speed, you can contact us, but please be aware that you will be fully liable for any consequences that may arise from doing so.

settings.title: What is the range of the scooter?
settings.content: We offer two variations of our Aurora E-scooter. The standard model has a maximum range of up to 65 km, while the long-range model can go up to 100 km on a full charge, making it ideal for longer commutes or extended rides.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available  24/7 All Day, Every Day.
